|------|--------|-------|----------|--------|
| [Lateral Pterygoid]({{< var ref-lateral-pterygoid.path >}}) | {{< var ref-lateral-pterygoid.origin >}} | {{< var ref-lateral-pterygoid.insertion >}} | {{< var ref-lateral-pterygoid.nerve >}} | {{< var ref-lateral-pterygoid.action >}} |

# Origin
**Superior Head:** Greater wing of sphenoid bone (infratemporal crest); **Inferior head:** Lateral surface of pterygoid plate (lat surface) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Insertion
**Superior Head:** Tempormandibular joint (articular disc); **Inferior head:** Mandible (condylar process) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Innervation

[Mandibular (V~3~) divison of CN V via lateral pterygoid n.]({{< var ref-cn5.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Action
**BIL:** Protrudes mandible (pulls articular disk forward); **UNIL:** Lateral movements of mandible (chewing)  @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Clinical Significance
